name: 8th International Conference on Applied Research in Management, Economics and Accounting
content: We have welcomed attendees from all over the world: Mexico, the United States, Italy, Poland, Portugal, Croatia, Malaysia, Liberia, France, Georgia, Cyprus, Vietnam, Algeria, Slovakia, India, Nepal, Colombia, and Japan, to name a few. The versatility and diversity of our events made for some fascinating and important discussions, and offered an interesting mix of viewpoints. We are bringing together a varied selection of academics, scholars, researchers, undergraduate and post-graduate students, leaders of for- or non-profits, industry stakeholders, and so much more. Learn about concepts like manifesting social responsibilities in strategic planning, determinants of benefits in retail payments market, corporate strategies for a circular economy, and numerous others.
